page.title: 01Introduction to Offerton.
page.content: {Offerton}is a suburb of Stockport, lying to the south of the town. It is mainly a residential area and there is very little industry. As a settlement it dates back to the time of the first Domesday survey. The old name for Offerton being{ {Alfretune. The greater part of the present housing was constructed in the 1960's. There is a very large council estate, known as The Offerton Estate and there is also a large development of private housing known as the Bean Leach estate. The majority of the people in{ {Offerton} work in the nearby { {Stockport}or{Manchester.}There are still large areas of open grassland usedd mainly for rough grazing.
